name: Last Light (itch) (ferin, ivanoski, Manuel Glock, Jenny Shen)
name_original: Last Light (itch) (ferin, ivanoski, Manuel Glock, Jenny Shen)
description:
Gameplay Instructions
  • WASD to navigate
  • Spacebar to jump
Description

You stole the last light. It's power to keep the darkness at bay is now your burden. Find a new place for it or be consumed by the darkness. Navigate through tricky environments and collect light orbs from the light to gain speed and escape the darkness. Will you find a new place for the last light to banish the darkness once more?

Team Name

Classic Jellyfish

Credits

Manuel Glock, Lead Designer & 3D-Artist

Ferenc Nagy, Programmer

Ivan Bird, Designer & Programmer

Jenny Shen, Composer & Audio Designer

Danilo Ricci, Composer

What platform is your game built for?

Windows

Contents that were created before the jam
  • Fonts
    • Signika Negative, Google Fonts
  • Assets
    • Flowers and small Rocks from Stylized Forest by TomkaGS
    • Rock and Bridge models from our previoes MegaJam Game - A bone to Pick
